Hi, I am pretty new to Heritrix.
Once awhile I get the error: Heritrix(-63)=
-Prerequisite unschedulable
failure, what does it mean?
I looked up the use=
r manual here:
http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual/glossary.htm=
l.  It is
not too explicit, so I am not sure how to fix it.
Then, I looked =
at code here:
http://crawler.archive.org/xref/org/archive/crawler/datamodel=
/FetchStatusCodes.html#38
The comment says that code is returned if DNS loo=
kup fails.
So how can I fix it?
Thanks in advance.
